metadata.titleEn: The data of zircon U-Pb ages of granites in south Qiangtang of the Tibetan Plateau (2014)
metadata.titleCn: 青藏高原南羌塘花岗岩锆石U-Pb年龄汇总（2014）
metadata.description:
This data set collected zircon U-Pb isotope age data of the granites in the southern Qiangtang terrane of the Tibetan Plateau from articles published before October 2014. The data were analyzed by Laser Ablation-Inductively Coupled Plasma-Mass Spectrometry (LA-ICPMS), Sensitive High-Resolution Ion Microprobe (SHRIMP), and Isotope Dilution Thermal Ionization Mass Spectrometry (ID TIMS).
The data were obtained according to laboratory standards, and the data quality met laboratory requirements.
The data contents are as follows:
Region 
Locality 
Lithology 
Sample No. 
Dating method 
Age (Ma) 
References
metadata.descriptionCn:
本数据集收集了2014年10月以前已发表文献中的青藏高原羌塘地体南缘花岗岩锆石U-Pb同位素年龄数据。数据由激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱计（Laser Ablation-Inductively Coupled Plasma-Mass spectrometry，LA-ICPMS）， 高灵敏度高分辨率离子探针质谱计（Sensitive High Resolution Ion Microprobe，SHRIMP），同位素稀释热电离质谱仪（Isotope Dilution Thermal Ionization Mass spectrometry，ID TIMS）等分析得来。
数据按照实验室标准获得，数据质量符合实验室要求。

数据包含以下内容：
Region：地区
Locality：地点
Lithology：岩性
Sample No.：样号
Dating method：测年方法
Age (Ma)：年龄（百万年）
References：参考文献

authorList.unitEn: Institute of Tibetan Plateau Research, Chinese Academy of Sciences

literatureList.titleEn: Zircon U–Pb age and Hf isotopic compositions of Mesozoic granitoids in southern Qiangtang, Tibet: Implications for the subduction of the Bangong–Nujiang Tethyan Ocean
literatureList.referenceEn: Liu, D.L., Shi, R.D., Ding, L., Huang, Q.S., Zhang, X.R., Yue, Y.H., &Zhang, L.Y. (2015). Zircon U–Pb age and Hf isotopic compositions of Mesozoic granitoids in southern Qiangtang, Tibet: Implications for the subduction of the Bangong–Nujiang Tethyan Ocean. Gondwana Research, 41, 157-172.

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of data collection methods used for determining zircon U-Pb ages in granites from the southern margin of the Qiangtang terrane in the Tibetan Plateau?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于确定青藏高原强塘地体南缘花岗岩锆石U-Pb年龄的数据收集方法的特点是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: Laser Ablation-Inductively Coupled Plasma-Mass Spectrometry (LA-ICPMS), Sensitive High Resolution Ion Microprobe (SHRIMP), Isotope Dilution Thermal Ionization Mass Spectrometry (ID TIMS)
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 激光烧蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICPMS），敏感高分辨率离子探针（SHRIMP），同位素稀释热电离质谱（ID TIMS）

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the underlying reasons for the selection of LA-ICPMS, SHRIMP, and ID TIMS as data collection methods for determining zircon U-Pb ages in granites of the southern Qiangtang terrane?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 选择LA-ICPMS、SHRIMP和ID TIMS作为确定南羌塘地体花岗岩锆石U-Pb年龄的数据采集方法的潜在原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The selection of LA-ICPMS, SHRIMP, and ID TIMS as data collection methods for determining zircon U-Pb ages in granites of the southern Qiangtang terrane is primarily due to their ability to provide precise and accurate isotopic age data. These methods are well-suited for geological samples and meet laboratory standards for data quality, ensuring reliable results. Additionally, these techniques are widely accepted in the scientific community for such analyses, allowing for consistency and comparability with previously published studies.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 选择LA-ICPMS、SHRIMP和ID TIMS作为确定南羌塘地体花岗岩锆石U-Pb年龄的数据采集方法，主要是因为它们能够提供精确和准确的同位素年龄数据。这些方法非常适合地质样品，并符合实验室数据质量标准，确保结果可靠。此外，这些技术在科学界广泛接受，便于与之前发表的研究进行一致性和可比性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary objective of collecting zircon U-Pb isotopic age data from granites in the southern Qiangtang terrane of the Tibetan Plateau?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集西藏高原南部强塘地块花岗岩的锆石U-Pb同位素年龄数据的主要目的是什麼？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objective of collecting zircon U-Pb isotopic age data from granites in the southern Qiangtang terrane of the Tibetan Plateau is to understand the geological history and evolution of the region by determining the age of rock formations. This data helps in reconstructing tectonic events and provides insights into the processes that have shaped the area over millions of years.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 收集藏南地区花岗岩锆石U-Pb同位素年龄数据的主要目的是通过确定岩石形成的年龄来了解该地区的地质历史和演化。这些数据有助于重建构造事件，并提供对数百万年来塑造该地区的过程的洞察。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What instrumental techniques are utilized to ensure the precision and accuracy of U-Pb zircon dating in granitic rocks, and what challenges might arise during data collection?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在花岗岩岩石的U-Pb锆石定年中，采用了哪些仪器技术来确保精确性和准确性，以及在数据收集过程中可能出现哪些挑战？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Instrumental techniques used to ensure precision and accuracy in U-Pb zircon dating for granitic rocks include Laser Ablation-Inductively Coupled Plasma-Mass Spectrometry (LA-ICPMS), Sensitive High Resolution Ion Microprobe (SHRIMP), and Isotope Dilution Thermal Ionization Mass Spectrometry (ID TIMS). These methods are applied following laboratory standards to meet data quality requirements. Challenges that might arise during data collection can include potential contamination, calibration of instruments, and ensuring consistent sample preparation to maintain high data quality.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 用于确保花岗岩岩石U-Pb锆石定年精度和准确性的仪器技术包括激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICPMS）、高灵敏度高分辨率离子探针（SHRIMP）和同位素稀释热离子化质谱（ID TIMS）。这些方法在实验室标准的指导下应用，以满足数据质量要求。在数据收集过程中可能出现的挑战包括潜在的污染、仪器的校准以及确保一致的样品制备，以维持高数据质量。
